ygData.subject: Re: Icy Greaves Camping
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I spent about 4 hours getting mine.  We were there for two and a half hours and got nothing, then got the greaves twice in 4 elites, then nothing for
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 16 Nov 1999, Bard wrote:
>
> Well, I just spent the past 5 and a half hours in the King's room in
> Permafrost, and the elite guards didn't even drop Bronze greaves, much less
> the Icy ones :o/ Anyone else have this experience?

I spent about 4 hours getting mine. We were there for two and
a half hours and got nothing, then got the greaves twice in 4
elites, then nothing for another hour and half after which I
left. My friends stayed a couple more hours and got no more
greaves.

We ended up getting 1 2h-silvery axes, 1 1h-silvery axe, 3
Zaharn's coronets (had to let one rot since there were only
two of us at the time), 3 symbols of loyalty to Vox (I've
never seen the king appear that many times in one night), 1
crystalline blade, and 2 frost totems. But only 2 icy
greaves, go figure.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
